title: [NEW] Having issues Patching 6.4? Click Here!
body:
Hey all,

In an effort to make this megathread better and more powerful than we can ever imagine, we decided to enhance it slightly...

http://i.imgur.com/9Vcx9FF.png?1

There.  Now then, time to annihilate any patching issues any of you may have!  If you're still hanging on, but don't see Victory anywhere in sight, drop us a comment and we'll help you out!

----------------------------------------------

> #***Files Scanned reaches over 9000!!!!! Or, 15k, 20k, etc***

The patcher needs to scan already installed files to make sure that none of the files are corrupt.  If it finds one, it replaces it and rescans the files.  This is why it can sometimes get as high as 20k, even though there aren't 20k files in the installation.  

**The best thing to do is let it scan files!**  If you restart the client, it may cause it to scan even more files.   The patcher will eventually stop scanning files, and it will patch normally afterward.

> #***Patcher never pops up, or disappears after you press "LAUNCH"***

This can be caused by corruption with the patcher itself or it failed to properly self-patch. Additionally, it may be due to some issues with the configuration of your computer system's permissions (meaning it can't properly save the files in the correct location). To resolve this, make sure to complete all the steps in our [Patching Issues Article](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/202969434-Patching-Issues)!

> #***Patcher stops/errors out at 33%, Patcher fails at 99%, or a general "Unspecified Error has occurred" message***

These are usually connection related errors. Either your computer is unable to maintain a stable connection, or a 3rd party security program is blocking League of Legends from properly patching. Many of the most common Anti-virus programs [have already whitelisted LoL](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues#wq3), however make sure to update yours to the latest version!

Also, even though you may have set specific exceptions in place before for your security program, League of Legends has gone through a major update. Therefore, your security program may recognize the old version of League of Legends, but not the new version. 

To get these issues resolved ASAP, make sure to go through our [Connection Issues Guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues)!

--------------------------------------------------------------

*If after completing these steps, and you still do not see the glorious orange 'LAUNCH' button, feel free to drop us a post in this thread!  Rioters as well as Wrenchmen volunteers will be on hand to respond and provide some additional help!*

> 

and in the main logs I found this labeled as "ERROR"

> 000000.827|  ERROR| Riot::RADS::Common::HTTPConnection::GetFile: E:/jenkins/workspace/rads-code-win-release/code/Solutions/RiotRADS/Source/RADS/Common/HTTPConnection.cpp(766): Perform request failed: "Peer certificate cannot be authenticated with given CA certificates" (curl code 60), for file:'/releases/live/projects/lol_air_client/releases/releaselisting_NA'.

> 000000.865|  ERROR| Riot::RADS::Common::HTTPConnection::GetFile: Failed retrieving '/releases/live/projects/lol_air_client/releases/releaselisting_NA' after 3 attempts.
> 000000.865|  ERROR| Riot::RADS::Patching::RetrieveReleaseListing: E:/jenkins/workspace/rads-code-win-release/code/Solutions/RiotRADS/Source/RADS/Patching/Networking/ClientServer/RemoteFileServerCommon.cpp(43): Failed to download listing file from "/releases/live/projects/lol_air_client/releases/releaselisting_NA" to temp file "C:/Riot Games/League of Legends/RADS/temp/TMP0.tmp"

Not sure what E:/jenkins is, but I don't have an E:/drive on my computer. :(

Edit: this error occurs immediately upon opening the launcher. Nothing has changed about my computer's configuration between any of the prior 6.x patches and today, and other internet services all work well.
I got the same
This ended up being a TLS misconfiguration at a higher network level.
jenkins.... god d*mn it leroy

so i've done every single action recommended even tried to reinstall but the patcher refuses to launch i cant even get it to open after i click the game launch icon the logo pops up then goes away and i've already made sure to set exclusions in all my software that could be causing issues please help

I know you said you've tried every single action recommended, but before we go too in-depth with troubleshooting, I just want to double-confirm that you have completed every single step found in our [Patching Issues Guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/202969434-Patching-Issues).  Some of the steps there may seem incredibly basic, but they are known to help resolve this kind of issue.

If you have done these steps already, reply back and let me know and I should be able to help out!
idk why but after patching and putting in my username and password, it said client version 6.3.16_02_05_12_04 is rejected by server.

It seems like there was some sort of corruption with the patch itself.  If you look at the error, our Servers are identifying your installation as having 6.3 installed, but not 6.4.  In order to get you patched to the latest version and get this fixed, you will need to [force a re-patch](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/202969434-Patching-Issues#wq5).

Let me know if you are still experiencing any issues!

Please take care of this issue.

But then after shutting down my laptop and re opening the next day, the problem started. Since I have tried many suggestions on the boards, I have tried reinstalling - but not even able to begin downloading the patches and so on - I have also updated my laptop to windows 10, from windows 8.

Essentially copy/pasting the same message every 2 days and asks for feedback, we give feedback and they copy/paste the same message. This is sad... I hope everything gets solved soon.

Hi, Im not sure if someone else is having this problem but since last patch the other day, I started having connection issues... The game wont let me play at all, it either shows a message saying i have been disconnected while loading screen is up or If I manage to get into the rift is "attempting to reconnect" aaaaall time, so cant play at all.... This is only since last patch, I normally have a smooth gameplay and it doesnt even matter the region I'm in, a while ago tested a custom game in na server and then in lan server.. Is prety much the same. Can someone help me? thanks u-u

(This worked for me. I don't know if it will work for others.)

Here's (hopefully) a fix that can help you with your patching issues. ;)

If you're experiencing unlimited files:
1.) Quit League Patcher if its open.
2.) If you have League on your desktop, right click it and select *Open File Location*
             (If you don't have it on your desktop, find League of Legends manually on FIle Explorer)
3.) From there you should see a list of folders:
     Config
     Logs
  *RADS
     lockfile
     lol.launcher.admin
     lol.launcher
4.) Open the *RADS folder.
5.) Open *lol_game_client* folder 
   (If you don't see it open *projects* folder instead. You will see *lol_game_client* from there.)
6.) From there you should see a list of folders:
   *filearchives
     managedfiles
     releases
7.) Delete *filearchives 
   (Right click on the name of the folder. You should see an option to delete it.)
8.) Wait until the deletion of the folder is done.
9.) Relaunch League of Legends

TL;DR- Open file location of League of Legends> RADS> projects> lol_game_client> delete filearchives folder> relaunch patcher.

Will forcing a re-patch fix region specific issues?  Ever since this patch me and a few people have been getting weird issues in game.  Mainly, having your champ being locked in place, having spells delayed, and frequent disconnects (i havent had the latter, but ive seen the disconnect window pop up for like five seconds yet the game itself has no issue).  I figured this is just what lag looks like on a good connection (i had my faulty telephone wires replaced by Frontier and my connection checked out) but it doesnt seem to be lag (no ping changes reported in client, minions and enemy champs behave without lag when i'm frozen).  It seems to be happening only in the US and Canada.  I've been playing in EU West since it started with no issue, and i'm afraid to come back.  :(

Hey all, 

playing on a macbook and decided to play a ranked match for the first time since 6.4 on this mac. Well champ select went smooth, however upon loading in, only a black screen appeared and it never let me load in. After 2 minutes of a black screen, i restarted the computer and re-opened league, reconnected only to have the same black screen, I couldn't command+tab out and also i couldn't move my mouse. Any tips??
